p: The title compound was prepared according to the general procedure for the synthesis of N-Aryl-benzenesulfonamides previously described using 138 mg of (2-amino-5-bromo-phenyl)-pyridin-4-yl-methanone and 101 mg of 4-methoxy-benzenesulfonyl chloride. 1H-NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3): δ 3.69 (s, 3H), 6.68 (d, 2H, J = 8.8 Hz), 7.36-7.47 (m, 4H), 7.46, 7.55-7.69 (m, 5H), 9.65 (s, 1H). MS: m/z 448.3 (M + + 1).
